text: 7.26: Mt 11.9; Ru 1.76Nde maaŋgia thagɨna ganɨ zav wari vegi? Ee, nde Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ guma ganɨ zav vegire? Ahaŋ, nde Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ gumara ganɨ zav wari vegi. Gu guigira nde nzuai, nde mba gangi Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ guma, ana guigira mba harigi Fhe Bakɨmen kamthooŋ gumgi kambarigi guma ma.
